title.narrative: 08-03 Communication for Development (C4D) URGENCE EBOLA

description.narrative: The activities of Communication for Development (C4D) Ebola, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: (intersectorial salaries, zonal offices, supply/log and IT, intersectorial Communication for Development (C4D) and external communication)

title.narrative: The activities of C4D Ebola
Ebola-related resistance/reticence incidents reported in the past week
Sub-prefectures, chiefdoms and/or counties reporting resistance/reticence to cooperating with frontline workers in the past week

Households reached with interpersonal communication on Ebola prevention
Proportion of population surveyed who indicated discriminatory attitude towards Ebola survivors
Proportion of population surveyed who rejected alternatives to traditional burials/funerals
